CustomField.formula: if ( OR( RecordType.Id = $Label.Quote_RecordTypeId_HorsStandard_15 , RecordType.Id = $Label.Quote_RecordTypeId_HorsStandard_Draft_15, RecordType.Id = $Label.Quote_RecordTypeId_HorsStandardLectureSeule_15 ) , $Label.Quote_Hors_Standard , if ( OR( RecordType.Id = $Label.Quote_RecordTypeId_Parc_Draft , RecordType.Id = $Label.Quote_RecordTypeId_Parc , RecordType.Id = $Label.Quote_RecordTypeId_Parc_LectureSeule ) , $Label.Quote_Parc , $Label.Quote_Standard ) )
CustomField.label: Type d'enregistrement
